text: Bradley Joseph Bubb (born 30 May 1988) is a professional footballer who plays as a striker for Wealdstone. Born in England, he represents Grenada at international level. ==Club career== Born in Harrow, Bubb spent his early career with Hendon and Queens Park Rangers. Bubb later played non-league football for Chalfont St Peter, Beaconsfield SYCOB and Farnborough.Farnborough F.C. profile He moved to Aldershot Town on 6 June 2011, signing a two-year contract. He made his debut for Aldershot on 13 August 2011, in the Football League. On Monday 9 January 2012, following the expiration of his loan at Conference South side Basingstoke Town, Bubb joined another Conference South side, Eastleigh, on loan for the rest of the season. Bubb won the Conference South Player of the Month award in February 2012. He also spent a loan spell at Woking, and after leaving Aldershot, played in Belgium for Royal Antwerp. He then re-signed for Aldershot in January 2014, before being released at the end of the season. He then signed for Havant & Waterlooville, netting 11 times in 44 appearances, and Oxford City in June 2015. On 23 June 2016, Bubb joined National League South side Ebbsfleet United on a one-year deal. On 23 February 2018, he signed for National League South side Wealdstone on an 18-month deal. ==International career== Bubb made his international debut for Grenada on 26 November 2010.Caribbean Football Database profile ==Personal life== Bubb is the younger brother of Byron Bubb, and cousin to Alvin Bubb. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Grenadian footballers Category:Grenada international footballers Category:Hendon F.C. players Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:Chalfont St Peter A.F.C. players Category:Beaconsfield Town F.C. players Category:Farnborough F.C. players Category:Aldershot Town F.C. players Category:Basingstoke Town F.C. players Category:Eastleigh F.C. players Category:Woking F.C. players Category:Havant & Waterlooville F.C. players Category:Oxford City F.C. players Category:Wealdstone F.C. players Category:Ebbsfleet United F.C. players Category:Royal Antwerp F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:National League (English football) players Category:Belgian Second Division/Belgian First Division B players Category:2011 CONCACAF Gold Cup players Category:English people of Grenadian descent Category:Footballers from the London Borough of Harrow Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Association football forwards
title: Bradley Bubb
